title: New sona
body: Is it me, or is Sona now a touch OP? I was playing Kalista and my support was Leona and she was 2-3 hitting me, and 3-4 hitting Leona in lane. It just seems like a faster annie if the Sona gets Lich Bane.

replies.body: I main Sona. She's like Cait, she's meant to be a poke support. Thats when she thrives. If your Leo isnt bright enough to know that Sona loses as soon as Leo engages, then maybe its just the Leona. Leona is like, the main counter to Sona.
Didn't she get buffed by "accident" last patch?
she isn't really op. If she hadn't built a lichbane and poked you down/killed you first you and leona could probably one shot her.
